about_the_game:
Rise Eternal introduces “Tales”, story missions that complement the campaigns. In this tale you will play as the new Loth Wielder, Kastus Maal, a Risen scholar who was killed at the battle of Grey Tor. His special affinity for necromancy is a lure to the undead and the Risen flock to him in service of the Empress. Explore four new maps as Kastus pursues revenge against Cecilia Stoutheart. Uncover powerful new artifacts, artifact set bonuses and discover all the secrets of the Risen.

With Rise Eternal you’ll soon find that there is a lot more to unearth in Aerbor!
